channel.title: How to make a OBJECT MODEL FROM SCRATCH!
channel.description:
first of all...
I will show you in metasequioua.. Get Ready DUMB PPL WHO DONT WANNA GO TO SCKOOL, coz im going to show you WHY in simple math equations! :D:D:D :D
~~~
Chapter One: Making your first box!! lol (without using primitives!!)
First, open up metaseq. Second, turn metaseq. to something like this:
gr bl re
that means blue facing left, green facing top and red facing bottom.
Red represents LENGTH, OR X! Blue represents WIDTH, OR Y! green represents.. HEIGHT! OR Z!
Now what was that lesson in elementary about length, width, and height? LENGTH x WIDTH x HEIGHT = 3D FIGURE! right! lol
click the create button, then click "both" and "line" in the thing that pops up! make a simple line a bit over the blue line. then carefully, make a square! make sure to take teh short way and not just click down and get a messed up X box.. lol
there. say to yourself, "I want my model to be this length!"
right. length, check.
now, scroll metaseq's red line to where the blue line was before. again... make a square!
"i want my model... to be this wide!"
then, length. make the green line straight up your screen. click "move" and click the "draw points of both length and width, and put them as high as you want.
there you go, you now have a simple box... NOT! a square/cube has... _ sides! *dunno* DUHHH four! lol
you did 3 variables of the square... you need 4 variables. finish the reset of the cube by connection and making squares again. then after that, "move" to make the lines straight.
now you can do whatever you want. remember btw u will get a "contains quads" error if you use complete squares. click the "wire" button and click the second option from the top. CUT ALL SQUARES IN HALF, CHANGE THE "LINE" TO "FACE" COLOR IT YOUR OWN... AND HAVE FUN ADDING TRAINGLES OR RECTANGLES OR WHATEVER.....
SORRY, i dont know how to make a weapon. making weapons are so complicated because:
1. the handle tends tow be very big, or very small and the metaseq zoom is not focused there. 2. I am an object creator... lol
WELL THATS THE SIMPLE OBJECT! BTW.. IF UR SAD U CANT MAKE WEPS... I THINK THE NEXT TUT WILL WORK :)
do the same as an object, but smaller... and use the "move" option more often. LMFAO, OR SIMPLY MAKE A BOGUS GIANT OPJECT AND NAME IT A VEHICLE! LMFAO.

item.dc:creator: @jbblaze jbblaze
item.description:
@jbblaze wrote:

[quote=“ak226688, post:5, topic:275935”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=364476.msg2766736#msg2766736 date=1240860812]

no offence but igot bored after the first sentence.

In other words, use correct english and use several pictures to explain what you’re doing.
[/quote]ye i get easily distracted[/quote]

Lol ADD? not easily distracted. just bored. Try not to talk to readers like there idiots. some people could be new to models. and for newcomers, this is a useless guide. =/

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @green2 ...green...
item.description:
@green2 wrote:

first of all…

I will show you in metasequioua…
Get Ready DUMB PPL WHO DONT WANNA GO TO SCKOOL, coz im going to show you WHY in simple math equations! :D:D:D 


Chapter One: Making your first box!! lol (without using primitives!!)

First, open up metaseq. 
Second, turn metaseq. to something like this:

           gr
        bl
           re

that means blue facing left, green facing top and red facing bottom.

Red represents LENGTH, OR X!
Blue represents WIDTH, OR Y!
green represents.. HEIGHT! OR Z!

Now what was that lesson in elementary about length, width, and height?
LENGTH x WIDTH x HEIGHT = 3D FIGURE! right! lol

click the create button, then click "both" and "line" in the thing that pops up!
make a simple line a bit over the blue line.
then carefully, make a square! make sure to take teh short way and not just click down and get a messed up X box.. lol

there. say to yourself, "I want my model to be this length!"

right. length, check.

now, scroll metaseq's red line to where the blue line was before.
again... make a square!

"i want my model... to be this wide!"

then, length.
make the green line straight up your screen.
click "move" and click the "draw points of both length and width, and put them as high as you want.

there you go, you now have a simple box... NOT! a square/cube has... _ sides! *dunno* DUHHH four! lol

you did 3 variables of the square... you need 4 variables. finish the reset of the cube by connection and making squares again. then after that, "move" to make the lines straight.

now you can do whatever you want. remember btw u will get a "contains quads" error if you use complete squares. click the "wire" button and click the second option from the top. CUT ALL SQUARES IN HALF, CHANGE THE "LINE" TO "FACE" COLOR IT YOUR OWN... AND HAVE FUN ADDING TRAINGLES OR RECTANGLES OR WHATEVER..... 

SORRY, i dont know how to make a weapon. making weapons are so complicated because:

1. the handle tends tow be very big, or very small and the metaseq zoom is not focused there.
2. I am an object creator... lol

WELL THATS THE SIMPLE OBJECT! BTW.. IF UR SAD U CANT MAKE WEPS... I THINK THE NEXT TUT WILL WORK :)

do the same as an object, but smaller... and use the "move" option more often.
LMFAO, OR SIMPLY MAKE A BOGUS GIANT OPJECT AND NAME IT A VEHICLE! LMFAO.
